properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST A, DECISION_LIST B WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE AND B.D_LIST_REASON is not null

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_TO , A.POST_START , A.POST_END , A.POST_ONLINE , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_ADDRESS , A.POST_DAY , A.PAYMENT , A.GENDER , A.ADVANTAGE , A.BENEFIT , A.FULLTIME_YN , A.POST_M_NAME , A.POST_M_EMAIL , A.POST_M_PHONE , A.EXP_CODE , I.EXP_NAME , A.JOB_CODE , C.JOB_NAME , A.PERIOD_CODE , D.PERIOD_NAME , A.HOUR_CODE , E.HOUR_NAME , A.LOCATION_CODE , F.LOCATION_NAME , A.PAY_CODE , G.PAY_NAME , A.AGE_CODE , J.AGE_NAME , A.HR_ID , A.DEGREE_CODE , H.DEGREE_LEVEL , A.D_LIST_CODE FROM POST A, DECISION_LIST B, JOB C , work_period D, WORK_HOUR E , LOCATION F, PAY G, DEGREE H, EXP I, AGE J WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE AND A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE AND A.PERIOD_CODE = D.PERIOD_CODE AND A.HOUR_CODE = E.HOUR_CODE AND A.LOCATION_CODE = F.LOCATION_CODE AND A.PAY_CODE = G.PAY_CODE AND A.DEGREE_CODE = H.DEGREE_CODE AND A.EXP_CODE = I.EXP_CODE AND A.AGE_CODE = J.AGE_CODE AND B.D_LIST_REASON is not null LIMIT ?, 10

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_TO , A.POST_START , A.POST_END , A.POST_ONLINE , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_ADDRESS , A.POST_DAY , A.PAYMENT , A.GENDER , A.ADVANTAGE , A.BENEFIT , A.FULLTIME_YN , A.POST_M_NAME , A.POST_M_EMAIL , A.POST_M_PHONE , A.EXP_CODE , I.EXP_NAME , A.JOB_CODE , C.JOB_NAME , A.PERIOD_CODE , D.PERIOD_NAME , A.HOUR_CODE , E.HOUR_NAME , A.LOCATION_CODE , F.LOCATION_NAME , A.PAY_CODE , G.PAY_NAME , A.AGE_CODE , J.AGE_NAME , A.HR_ID , A.DEGREE_CODE , H.DEGREE_LEVEL , A.D_LIST_CODE , K.B_CODE , L.B_BLOCK FROM POST A, DECISION_LIST B, JOB C , work_period D, WORK_HOUR E , LOCATION F, PAY G, DEGREE H, EXP I, AGE J, HR K, BUSINESS L WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE AND A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE AND A.PERIOD_CODE = D.PERIOD_CODE AND A.HOUR_CODE = E.HOUR_CODE AND A.LOCATION_CODE = F.LOCATION_CODE AND A.PAY_CODE = G.PAY_CODE AND A.DEGREE_CODE = H.DEGREE_CODE AND A.EXP_CODE = I.EXP_CODE AND A.AGE_CODE = J.AGE_CODE AND A.HR_ID = K.HR_ID AND K.B_CODE = L.B_CODE AND B.D_LIST_REASON is not null AND A.POST_CODE = ?

SELECT A.POST_AD_CODE , A.POST_AD_DATE , A.POST_AD_PAID , A.POST_AD_WEEK , A.AD_CODE , B.AD_NAME , B.AD_PRICE , A.P_METHOD_CODE , C.P_METHOD_NAME FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT A, AD B, PAYMENT_METHOD C WHERE A.AD_CODE = B.AD_CODE AND A.P_METHOD_CODE = C.P_METHOD_CODE AND POST_CODE = ?
